mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userregistry.user ( id, full_name, email, username, date_of_birth, gender, photo ) VALUES ( CAST(#{user.id} AS UUID), SUBSTRING(#{user.fullName}, 1, 255), SUBSTRING(#{user.email}, 1, 255), SUBSTRING(#{user.username}, 1, 255), #{user.dateOfBirth}, CAST(#{user.gender} AS gender_type), #{user.photo} )
